channel.title: [PI] Donator commands

item.title: [PI] Donator commands
item.dc:creator: @metal_k0 metal k0
item.description:
@metal_k0 wrote:

[quote=“imsuperman05, post:21, topic:404134”]add this in the player commands then not in donator

if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("tank") && c.isDonator == 1) { int i = 0; c.getPA().addSkillXP(0, 0); c.getPA().addSkillXP(1210422, 1); c.getPA().addSkillXP(0, 2); c.getPA().addSkillXP(14000000, 3); c.getPA().addSkillXP(14000000, 4); c.getPA().addSkillXP(136594, 5); c.getPA().addSkillXP(14000000, 6); c.playerXP[3] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(99)+5; c.playerLevel[3] = c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[3]); c.getPA().refreshSkill(3); } else { c.sendMessage("<shad=6081134><img=0>You must be a Donator to use this command, for more into visit ******<img=0></col>"); } }[/quote]

Oh nvm I think I did something wrong with && c.isDonator == 0 bla bla bla, thanks for all your help :P.

[quote=“Shadowspkin, post:22, topic:404134”]Why did you make it less then it being a donor actually… “>” less then sign to the 1 ;o

if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("tank") && c.isDonator >= 1) [/quote]

Yeah I think something went wrong? I’m 100% sure I did put 0 but when I compiled it said that. Anyways, it works now thanks for your help

ONE MORE THING;

I do need alot of help for this… xD anyways, I can just repeat this command as much as I want. How can I make it so I can only do it once?

Read full topic

Why did you make it less then it being a donor actually… “>” less then sign to the 1 ;o

if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("tank") && c.isDonator >= 1)

item.title: [PI] Donator commands
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

add this in the player commands then not in donator

if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("tank") && c.isDonator == 1) { int i = 0; c.getPA().addSkillXP(0, 0); c.getPA().addSkillXP(1210422, 1); c.getPA().addSkillXP(0, 2); c.getPA().addSkillXP(14000000, 3); c.getPA().addSkillXP(14000000, 4); c.getPA().addSkillXP(136594, 5); c.getPA().addSkillXP(14000000, 6); c.playerXP[3] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(99)+5; c.playerLevel[3] = c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[3]); c.getPA().refreshSkill(3); } else { c.sendMessage("<shad=6081134><img=0>You must be a Donator to use this command, for more into visit ******<img=0></col>"); } }

if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("tank") && c.isDonator >= 1) { c.sendMessage("<shad=6081134><img=0>You must be a Donator to use this command, for more into visit ******<img=0></col>");

item.title: [PI] Donator commands
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

[quote=“Shadowspkin, post:16, topic:404134”]Double facepalm, Ofc… I did not think of that… Players=Donators they have 0 rights witch classifies them as a player.

The only thing I can think of is were you see “c.sendMessage” it should be like “c.printLine” Im not sure I think sendmessage is what they use for PI but printline is for java soooo, try it ^_^.

c.sendMessage("<shad=6081134><img=0>You must be a Donator to use this command, for more into visit ******<img=0></col>"); } }[/quote]
lol ye printline is only for java and it’s usually System.out.println < learned that an hour ago. PI uses c.sendMessage.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Donator commands
item.dc:creator: @Shadowspkin Shadowspkin
item.description:
@Shadowspkin wrote:

Double facepalm, Ofc… I did not think of that… Players=Donators they have 0 rights witch classifies them as a player.

The only thing I can think of is were you see “c.sendMessage” it should be like “c.printLine” Im not sure I think sendmessage is what they use for PI but printline is for java soooo, try it ^_^. Theres also what the other guy said above me :d

c.sendMessage("<shad=6081134><img=0>You must be a Donator to use this command, for more into visit ******<img=0></col>"); } }

new=

c.PrintLine("<shad=6081134><img=0>You must be a Donator to use this command, for more into visit ******<img=0></col>"); } }

Read full topic

if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("tank")) { int i = 0; c.getPA().addSkillXP(0, 0); c.getPA().addSkillXP(1210422, 1); c.getPA().addSkillXP(0, 2); c.getPA().addSkillXP(14000000, 3); c.getPA().addSkillXP(14000000, 4); c.getPA().addSkillXP(136594, 5); c.getPA().addSkillXP(14000000, 6); c.playerXP[3] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(99)+5; c.playerLevel[3] = c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[3]); c.getPA().refreshSkill(3); } else { if (c.isDonator == 0) c.sendMessage("<shad=6081134><img=0>You must be a Donator to use this command, for more into visit ******<img=0></col>");

& when I try to do this with an account that is not donater nothing happens but also that line doesn’t show… anyone know why? :S
